backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining restaurant backend with menu items (10 dishes with prices), contact info, and admin-only functions to update menu prices and contact details.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: Home page, Menu page with editable prices, About Us page, and Contact page with editable info.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-line summaries of 12 frontend files covering routing, layout, pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, establishing a warm earth-tone design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Restaurant Website application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining four routes (Home, Menu, About, Contact) wrapped in a Layout component with type-safe router configuration.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright year, heart icon, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing consistent page structure with Navigation header, main content outlet, and Footer across all routes.
frontend/src/components/MenuItemCard.tsx: Card component for menu items with inline price editing (input, save, cancel) enabled in admin mode using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation header with restaurant branding, desktop/mobile menu toggle, and active route highlighting for four main pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating menu items and contact info using the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm color palette (cream, terracotta, amber) for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page displaying restaurant mission with three goal cards (quality food, fair pricing, friendly service) using icons and styled components.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page showing address, phone, hours, and email with admin edit functionality for authenticated users to update contact information.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page featuring a hero banner with restaurant welcome message and three service highlight cards (dine-in/takeaway, friendly service, clean environment).
frontend/src/pages/Menu.tsx: Menu page displaying categorized food items (main dishes, fast food, drinks) with admin mode toggle for authenticated users to edit prices.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, Inter font family, custom border radius variables, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for a multi-page restaurant website with features for home, menu, about, and contact pages, including image requirements and architectural notes about editable menu prices and navigation.
